0.text: Innate: After casting an ability, Taric empowers his next two basic attacks within 5 seconds to each gain  100% total attack speed, deal 25 − 93 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus armor) bonus magic damage, and  reduce the cooldowns of his basic abilities by 1 second.
0.html: Innate: After casting an ability, Taric empowers his next two basic attacks within 5 seconds to each gain  100% total attack speed, deal 25 − 93 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus armor) bonus magic damage, and  reduce the cooldowns of his basic abilities by 1 second.
markedPassages: 100% total attack speed
25 − 93 (based on level)
reduce

0.text: Active: Taric  heals himself and nearby allied champions for 25 (+ 15% AP) (+ 1% of Taric's maximum health) per charge of Starlight's Touch that he periodically stocks, up to a maximum amount.  Bravado's empowered attacks each grant one charge.
0.html: Active: Taric heals himself and nearby allied champions for 25 (+ 15% AP) (+ 1% of Taric's maximum health) per charge of Starlight's Touch that he periodically stocks, up to a maximum amount. Bravado's empowered attacks each grant one charge.
markedPassages: heals
Bravado's

1.text: Starlight's Touch can heal up to a maximum of 125 (+ 75% AP) (+ 5% of Taric's maximum health) at 5 charges.
1.html: Starlight's Touch can heal up to a maximum of 125 (+ 75% AP) (+ 5% of Taric's maximum health) at 5 charges.

0.text: Passive: Taric gains  bonus armor and forms a  tether between him and the ally bound by Bastion. While the tether persists, the ally also gains the bonus armor and Taric's abilities are mimicked to them, though the effects do not stack.
0.html: Passive: Taric gains  bonus armor and forms a tether between him and the ally bound by Bastion. While the tether persists, the ally also gains the bonus armor and Taric's abilities are mimicked to them, though the effects do not stack.
markedPassages: bonus armor
tether

1.text: Active: Taric  shields himself and the target allied champion for 2.5 seconds, binding them with Bastion.
1.html: Active: Taric shields himself and the target allied champion for 2.5 seconds, binding them with Bastion.
markedPassages: shields

2.text: Taric can also self-cast to shield himself; if he is untethered, this will instead target the nearest ally. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
2.html: Taric can also self-cast to shield himself; if he is untethered, this will instead target the nearest ally. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.

0.text: Active: Taric winds up over 1 second, then projects a beam of starlight in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Taric winds up over 1 second, then projects a beam of starlight in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: stuns

1.text: Taric can move during Dazzle's windup.

0.text: Active: Taric calls down a star from above that descends to him over 2.5 seconds. Afterwards, he and nearby allied champions become  invulnerable for 2.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Taric calls down a star from above that descends to him over 2.5 seconds. Afterwards, he and nearby allied champions become invulnerable for 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: invulnerable
